body:
- Android 13 support
- Improve Android 12 support
- Improve built-in equalizer
- Improve support to external equalizers (e.g. wavelet, poweramp)
- Fix sleep timer (thanks @abelbabel)
- Code improvements/bug fixes
- Upgrade libs/dependecies
- Update translations (thanks to all contributors)

- Improved now playing
- Improved playing music from file managers 
(see: https://github.com/enricocid/Music-Player-GO/issues/461)
- Bug fixes

Thanks @CodeCubeNeo and all translators

Bug fixes

Thanks @CodeCubeNeo, @otaboard, @lgjint

- Improved now playing
- Multi-select to hide
- More notification actions options
- Play a single artist/album/folder...
- Improved swipe actions
- Queue/favorites: add delete button
- Review accents (see faq)
- Fix equalizer not opening
- Landscape layout improvements
- Many code improvements/fixes
- Translations update

- Fix close btn behaviour
- Code fixes/improvements
- Update dependencies
- Update Ukrainian translations (thanks Ihor Hordiichuk, @IhorHordiichuk)
More fixes

- Fixed a few crashes (thanks Carmine Nives)
- Update translations (Chinese - Traditional) - Thanks EarthlyEric
- Dependency update

- Use aosp style fast scroller (thanks @zhanghai)
- Add fast scroller to folder details
- Fix tabs theming issues
- Code simplifications/improvements
- Update translations: Portuguese (Brazil)

- Sleep timer (thanks @watauoa)
- Locale switcher
- Add back true dark theme...
- ...and an option to force pure black theme! :trollface:
- Songs can now be directly removed from lists
- UI review
- Attempt to fix notification not showing on certain Android 12 devices
- Updated/new translations (thanks everyone)
- Code improvements/cleaning
- Updated dependencies

- Replaced/removed outdated libraries
- Fix audio focus when recording voice messages (e.g. Telegram)
  Thanks Decim
- Fix equalizer not being restored properly
- Headset control buttons: double tap pause/resume to skip
- Fix songs saving when removing the app from recents
- Update dependencies
- Code improvements/cleaning
- Update translations (thanks everyone)

- Android 12: added a message to inform use of playback issues
PS: consider disabling battery optimization in system settings: 
Apps > All apps > Music Player GO > Battery > Unrestricted
- Fix filtering option
- Settings review
- Update translations

- Fix double click favorite, queue in player control panel (thanks hoangchung)
- Now playing: stick pause option until it is manually changed (thanks Glitchy-Tozier)
- Fix/improve night theme (thanks repparw)
- Update translations (thanks yzqzss, sr093906, calcitem, S3aBreeze)

- Android 12 support. For any issue please contact me (don't have
devices running S, only the emulator).

- Improve the app responsiveness to media button actions (thanks Sarah)
- Now playing: added a mode to pause when track is finished
- UI & themes/dark mode improvements/fixes
- Improve/update translations (thanks Allan Nordhøy/everyone)

- Queue: fix songs not being deletable (thanks Decim)
- Queue: other minor improvements
- Add Vietnamese/update translations (thanks everyone! :D)
- Update libs/plugins

- Better slide between tabs sensitity
- Fix all music tab sorting
- Update libs/plugins
- Update Simplified Chinese translations

Credits: OxygenCobalt, DECIM, 360Tencent

- Queue restoring
- Queue and favorites review/improvements
- Shuffle: to avoid performance issues big lists are limited to 250 songs
- Enable queue/favorites fast scroller
- Improved MediaPlayer errors handling
- Code fixes and optimizations
- Add swedish and update Italian translation
- Update libs

- Fix queue
- Fix favorites
- Fix duplicates not being filtered
- Fix sorting no.2
- Code improvement

- Fix sorting
- Lollipop: fix notification
- Add Lituanian and Basque translations/update translations
Minor fixes

Maintanance release:

- UI fixes/improvements
- Settings improvements/review
- Notification improvements
- Code optimizations
- Upgrade libs/dependencies
- Update translations (THANKS TO EVERYONE)

Credits: OxygenCobalt, Drhaal, SCOTT-HAMILTON and all the translators

- Fix playback speed option
- Fix error screen visibility
- Code simplifications

- New: playback speed
- New: organize queue songs
- New: option to disable animations
- New: quick tile
- Add new sorting options
  - Thanks vtkhatri
- Review Now Playind
  - Added new buttons (long click for description)
  - Thanks Drhaal
- Show covers in album tab/details
- Fix notification actions (Samsung)
  - Thanks Arlin Daniel and Dan Muntz
- Improve headphone buttons support
- Review settings
- Many fixes
- Update translations and dependencies

- Note: favorite songs will be wiped. Sorry. :)

- Fix and improve shuffle/queue
Note about songs tab: shuffled music will be queued only if it doesn't exceed 1000 entries
- Fix a crash when removing the app from recents
- Fix a crash due to incorrect audio focus handling
- Fix a crash when trying to filter the last element of the lists
- Minor code review

Special thanks goes to Ricardo and Matt :)
Fix crash at boot

- Covers: improve performance & reduce ANRs probability.
  Note: the mechanism to retrieve music had to be changed.
  This means loved songs will be lost. I'm sorry :)

- Improve filter opt.
- Improve swiping
- Improve songs visualization opt.
- Fix sorting
- Fix add album to queue
- Lollipop: fix Now Playing's seekbar
- Many other bug fixes and improvements
- Music tab: show no. of songs
- Update translations

Now playing dialog: fix cover not being updated

Thanks Soyeb Mullick for reporting

- Fix crash on boot while initializing the equalizer
- Fix crash due to embedded covers option
- Added a floating button on "all music" tab to shuffle songs
- Code improvements (thanks TacoTheDank)

- Bug fixes
- Just replaced an old library, used for saving songs and causing issues, with a more modern one. In light of this change loved songs will be lost. I'm sorry but it was needed :)
- Make automatic theme the default one (thanks Drhaal for the suggestion)
- Update libraries/dependencies

- Organize tabs
- Add albums to queue
- Manage loved/shuffled songs from queue
- Make edge to edge default
- Android 11: fix edge to edge
- Fix audio focus (thanks Drhaal)
- Reset volume when precise volume control is off (thanks Drhaal)
- Review system bars color
- Many code improvements and fixes
- Update/add translations

PS: loved songs will be cleared due to the changes to save mechanisms

- Return to the awesome old icon by Julian Javier Gomez
- Improve Media Player holder
- Code clean

- Fix crash in queue dialog
- Fix crashes due to wrong initialization of variables
- Update dependencies

- You can now use the tabs even when details/equalizer are opened (thanks Drhaal)
- Fix embedded cover option on/off summary (thanks Ricardo)
- Update translations

- Equalizer (for devices missing the system eq)
- New icons and revised design
- Embedded covers support
- Albums tab
- Fast seeking (long tap skip buttons)
- More options

- Improved Android 11 compatibility
- Swipe to remove queue/favorites songs or to queue songs
- Tabs are not clickable when you open artists details or equalizer to avoid issues
- Many fixes and source code improvements

- Fix AOD (Always On Display) not showing informations (thanks to Drhaal)
- Audio focus improvements
- Improvements to the saving mechanism of the last reproduced song
- Add Romanian translations (thanks to 1t3x)
- Add Galego (Galician) translations (thanks to Xose M)
- Upgrade libs and dependencies

- Active tabs management: fix incorrect tabs order (thanks Martin Teboul for reporting)
- Fix ErrorFragment crash
- Fix notification manager
- Project improvements (thanks TacoTheDank)
- Fix and improve English translations (thanks TacoTheDank)
- Add Polish translations (thanks SpacingBat3)
- Update Turkish translations (thanks Adem Furkan ÖZCAN)

- Fix a crash
- Update Indonesian translations (thanks @zmni )
- Added Indonesian and Dutch PlayStore listing descriptions. Thanks @zmni and Heimen Stoffels @Vistaus

- Notification management improvements
- Notification simplification
- Other minor code improvements
- App dependencies upgrade
- Updated Hindi translations (thanks so much Pirhszm Yfiz, @pirhszm )

- [Oreo and above] fix audio focus request crash. Thanks Stephan Maier for reporting the issue.
- Other minor media player holder improvements
- Upgrade build tools/kotlin plugin

- Fix missing player controls when handling play from other apps
- Fix issues with theming (automatic)/light system bars
- Improve seek text when music duration is above 60 minutes
- Update Russian translations
- Code improvements
Minor changes

- Design, UI performance and code quality improvements
(for geeks: coroutines, viewmodel, viewbinding etc)
- New font/icons: source sans pro/outline
- Added ability to:
  - Sort songs in details on the fly
  - Loop a song
  - Filter artists/folders
- Fix focus management option
- Fix artists sorting
- Review loved songs save mechanism
- Switched to material components theme
- Update libs
- Many other minor bug fixes
Removed tabs toggle preference

- Quick jump feature review: it now supports folders
- Fix and improve lists/fast scroller overlaps handling
- Erros: show an error screen instead of finishing the app
- Improve shuffling
- Physical media buttons: fixes (thanks abirke)
- Code optimization and other fixes
- Add Brazilian Portuguese language (thanks Glaucio Santos)
- Update translations (thanks everyone)

- Fixed a crash on boot
- Fixed a music service leak when rotating the device
- Code optimization (removed 299 lines of code!)
- Permission dialog: "Yes" and "No" are now replaced by "Ok" and "Cancel"
- Turkish & Hindi translations update

- Landscape: fix overlap issues between indicators and artists/folders list
- Landscape: fix crash when dialogs (e.g. now playing) are displayed
- Update Spanish translations
Code cleaning

- Android 10: add support for notification's SeekBar
- Music service simplifications

- Make dark theme deeper
- Landscape: 3 bug fixes
- Fix crash when music library is empty
- Accents dialog improvements
- Add rounded corners to themes dialog

Fixes to media buttons handling.

Thanks to keddad for testing.
Code improvements :P

- Fix blank screen on certain devices
- Fix dialogs titles blinking cursor issue
- Remove waveform MusicBar (for now) for compatibility issues
- Improve edge-to-edge
- Respond to headsets controls
- Improve music loading mechanism
- Show a loading progress bar while fetching music 
- Enable accent preference copying (long click)
- Code improvements/fixes
- Add French and Russian translations
- Translations update

Many thanks to anyone who helped me improving MPGO :)
Minor code review

4.0.0:
- New tabbed UI: artists, all songs, folders, settings
- Automatic theme (following system on Android Q and battery level
on older versions, as per guidelines)
- Last reproduced song (and position) is now saved&restored
- Now playing dialog (click on the bottom panel):
  - Music bar (spectrum)
  - Media buttons
  - 'Add to loved songs' button
  - Volume fine control
- Simple queue management
- Loved songs
- Sorting
- New accents scheme
- Landscape support
- Many fixes/improvements
Android 10: fix playback. Thanks Robin H.
Crash fix

Maintenance release that brings:
- Fixes to focus and permissions dialog
- Indicator Fast Scroll by Reddit version upgrade
- Enhancements to music loading mechanism

- Bring back original precise volume dialog implementation:
The volume control is now PRECISE letting You to have 
a complete control on the actual volume step.
Thanks to Arianna Masciolini!!

- Upgrade Dynamic Toasts version

Notice: this is the last update of the 3.x branch. The next iteration (4.0 EX) will feature a
complete rewrite from scratch and it will include most of the features You requested (folders,
tab with all songs, better focus management, better navigation, now playing, queue management,
new UI options, new theme, Android Q automatic dark theme support and so on).

You can follow all the updates here (gonna keep commits human-readable):
https://github.com/enricocid/Music-Player-GO/commits/master-mpgo-ex

Fix Indicator Fast Scroll indexes while searching. Thanks to Steven Schoen
(https://github.com/DSteve595) from Reddit :D

Notice: this is the last release of 3.x. The next update (4.0 EX) means full MPGO rewrite 
from scratch and it will include many new features (folders, all songs tab, better focus handling, 
better navigation, now playing, queue management, new ui options, new theme, android Q automatic dark theme
and so on)

You can follow all the updates here (you can read commits messages, gonna keep them human readable):
https://github.com/enricocid/Music-Player-GO/commits/master-mpgo-ex

- Indicator Fast scroll: make the selected index the first visible item in artists list
- Fix artists sorting
- Upgrade Indicator Fast Scroll library

Indicator Fast Scroll: as suggested in #88 direct scrolling was implemented.

Note: Quick buttons to scroll directly to top/bottom of the list will be added in Music Player GO EX.
Move songs list to top when switching albums

- Fix next song not being played automatically after song reproduction completion
- Update Turkish translations
Update Indonesian translations
Fix albums songs incorrect sort order

- Raleway font the return!
- Minor UI review
- Fixes
Source code improvements (thanks TacoTheDank, https://gitlab.com/TacoTheDank)

- Apply color themes more smoothly
- Make player controls info auto-scroll when too long
- Code improvements

Fix playback from intent

- Set played album properly so user can navigate through songs using skip buttons also from intent
- Fix playback of duplicated songs filtered
- Simplifications

- Add close button to notification
- Remove duplicated songs (those saved in multiple copies in different paths)
- Code cleaning/improvements
Added possibility to open audio files from outside the app
Fix music player service
Little changes at music player service

- New indicator fast scroll by Reddit
- Major UI review
- Apply themes and accents smoothly
- Use default material theme font
- Preferences management has changed, so you have to re-apply them
- Code improvements
Minor reviews

- Update libs and plugins;
- Attempt to fix a crash on boot;

- Fix a crash when trying to change song from notification when app is closed (thanks to @sagorahmed for issue reporting)
- Improve code
- Update kotlin plugin

- Fix a crash on Android M thanks to @sagorahmed and Alex Lockwood (@alexjlockwood).
- Added Hindi support thanks to Somesh Kumar (@TheSomeshKumar).
- Update the app's building blocks (libs, etc).
Fix colors palette
Reduce apk size

- Review/improve the loading music mechanism
- Fix Turkish translations (credits: Adem Furkan ÖZCAN)
Add Turkish translations (credits: Adem Furkan ÖZCAN)

- Review WaveView
- Minor UI changes
- Fixes to artist details layout

- Implement new WaveSideBar scroller (enabled touching the edge of the screen)!
- Fix searchbar toggle not working
Code cleaning and simplifications
Hide search toggle option when on artist details

- Hello Kotlin! 
Despite the app dimensions increased, the introduction of this new language brought a code simplification (from 3205 to 2499 lines of code)! 
- New permission rationale dialog
- Per-album shuffle
- Added back colored ripples here and there
- Reduced search bar height
- Improved albums stroke
- Other minor UI changes and fixes
Maintenance release
Code cleaning
A minor fix ...
Restore albums/songs recyclerview position on resume
Code cleaning

- New rounded fast scroller!
- Android P compatibility (if You have problems on P let me know before giving a negative review, cause I don't have a device running it! ... thanks)

- Added German translations!: thanks to Malte Kiefer (beli3ver - https://github.com/beli3ver)
- Other minor changes (UI adjustments, code cleaning etc...)

- Update strings
- Reduce album's title lines to 4
Fix album item overlapping issues

- Fixes and simplifications to animations;
- Use app version as placeholder on top panel;
UI fixes
UI improvements
Only handle play all visibility when it is enabled
Minor UI reviews

- Added Spanish translations (thanks to @uzluisf )
- Horizontally slide too long played song/album text in controls panel (long click on it);
Refactoring

- Changed permissions rationale dialog icon
- Code refactoring

- Fix themes on v27
- Fix a class cast exception
- Rework permissions dialog (and fix a crash)

- Removed a filter that prevented some artists with tag <unknown> from being loaded
- Changes to fast scroller popup text color
String improvements by @STWheel

4 new theme accents!
Brown, gray light, gray dark and blue-gray

name: v2.4.1.1
body: Remove unused resources
Update translations

• Fixed an error that prevented all songs from being loaded (thanks Jonathan Boateng)
• Fast scrolling the revenge!
• Important artists loading improvements
• Settings return inside the controls panel
• Show the number of albums/songs on every artist
• Simplify themes to light and inverted
• The controls panel is now slightly colored
• Light navbar for android 8.1.1
• Sliding up panel review
• Playing song info refinements (thanks to @STWheel)
• Theme revisions

- Ukrainian and Russian support
- Other translations refinements

Thanks to by Stanislav (STWheel) for these changes
https://github.com/STWheel

name: v2.3.3.2
body: Fix a crash when no eq is present on the device
